channel.title: Runserver not working now?
channel.description:
Okay well I don't use Moparscape.org much, I learned Java and C# on my own. Here is the thing, I use to run a professional WoW Server and I made some money off of it. I switched to RuneScape about a year and a half ago, but instead of leeching someone I made my server from scratch, and Instead of using Text files to save characters/info I loaded them with a SQL into SQLYog (SQL Viewing Software) and it made it easier. I have been running my server for awhile and I make alot of money from donations and I don't want to shut my server down. I've been trying to fix this error I have been getting for awhile now.
1.) I was stupid, I didn't back up my server files. 2.) I saw some really cool 317 so I thought I'd check it out, so I downloaded the server and checked out some of his/her files. I accidentally dragged their Runserver.bat into my server folder (I'm an idiot) and now I can't run the server.
[CODE] @echo off color 0a title Server java -Xmx512m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.08-ga-bin.jar server pause [/CODE]
That's what THIS runserver.bat says, everytime I run it, the Command Prompt window just says..
"java is not recognized as an internal or external command"
I don't remember what I had in my runserver.bat, but can anyone help me fix this?

item.description:
@r34p4g3pk wrote:

How the fuck do you copy a run server, delete the one you had, paste the one you copied, save it, and not notice, sounds to me like your fucking around. A year and a half of rune scape private servers, and you can’t run a server? Your bullshitting me…

item.title: Runserver not working now?

item.description:
@r34p4g3pk wrote:

It doesn’t recognize the java version, obviously you would check your variables before posting her, as you must of learned that with a year and a half of programming rsps’s. I also suggest finding another run server code, that one isn;t the best you can get.

Read full topic

item.title: Runserver not working now?
item.dc:creator: @HydroTyme HydroTyme
item.description:
@HydroTyme wrote:

Okay well I don’t use Moparscape.org much, I learned Java and C# on my own. Here is the thing, I use to run a professional WoW Server and I made some money off of it. I switched to RuneScape about a year and a half ago, but instead of leeching someone I made my server from scratch, and Instead of using Text files to save characters/info I loaded them with a SQL into SQLYog (SQL Viewing Software) and it made it easier. I have been running my server for awhile and I make alot of money from donations and I don’t want to shut my server down. I’ve been trying to fix this error I have been getting for awhile now.

1.) I was stupid, I didn’t back up my server files.
2.) I saw some really cool 317 so I thought I’d check it out, so I downloaded the server and checked out some of his/her files. I accidentally dragged their Runserver.bat into my server folder (I’m an idiot) and now I can’t run the server.

@echo off
color 0a
title Server
java -Xmx512m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.08-ga-bin.jar server
pause

That’s what THIS runserver.bat says, everytime I run it, the Command Prompt window just says…

“java is not recognized as an internal or external command”

I don’t remember what I had in my runserver.bat, but can anyone help me fix this?
